verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that they give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of their possession <S%H272><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell in; <S%H3427><s%> and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> suburbs <S%H4054><s%> for the cities <S%H5892><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> them to the Levites. <S%H3881><s%>

The cities <S%H5892><s%> shall they have to dwell in; <S%H3427><s%> and their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> shall be for their livestock, <S%H929><s%> and for their substance, <S%H7399><s%> and for all their animals. <S%H2416><s%>

"The suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of the cities, <S%H5892><s%> which you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> shall be from the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> and outward <S%H2351><s%> one thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> around it. <S%H5439><s%>

You shall measure <S%H4058><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> for the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and for the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and for the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> being in the midst. <S%H8432><s%> This shall be to them the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of the cities. <S%H5892><s%>

"The cities <S%H5892><s%> which you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> they shall be the six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> which you shall give <S%H5414><s%> for the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> to: <S%H5414><s%> and besides them you shall give forty <S%H705><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All the cities <S%H5892><s%> which you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be forty <S%H705><s%> - eight <S%H8083><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> together with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

Concerning the cities <S%H5892><s%> which you shall give <S%H5414><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> from the many <S%H7227><s%> you shall take many; <S%H7227><s%> and from the few <S%H4592><s%> you shall take few: <S%H4592><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> which he inherits <S%H5157><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> of his cities <S%H5892><s%> to the Levites. <S%H3881><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H5674><s%> 'When you pass over the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%>

then you shall appoint <S%H7136><s%> you cities <S%H5892><s%> to be cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for you, <S%H7523><s%> that the manslayer who kills <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> unwittingly <S%H7684><s%> may flee there. <S%H5127><s%>

The cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be to you for refuge <S%H4733><s%> from the avenger, <S%H1350><s%> that the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> not die, <S%H4191><s%> until he stands <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> for judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
The cities <S%H5892><s%> which you shall give <S%H5414><s%> shall be for you six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge. <S%H4733><s%>

You shall give <S%H5414><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> they shall be cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge. <S%H4733><s%>

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> and for the foreigner <S%H1616><s%> living among <S%H8432><s%> them, <S%H8337><s%> shall these six cities <S%H5892><s%> be for refuge; <S%H4733><s%> that everyone who kills <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> unwittingly <S%H7684><s%> may flee there. <S%H5127><s%>

<S%H5221><s%>"'But if he struck him with an instrument <S%H3627><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> so that he died, <S%H4191><s%> he is a murderer: <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

If he struck <S%H5221><s%> him with a stone <S%H68><s%> in the hand, <S%H3027><s%> by which a man may die, <S%H4191><s%> and he died, <S%H4191><s%> he is a murderer: <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

Or if he struck <S%H5221><s%> him with a weapon <S%H3627><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> in the hand, <S%H3027><s%> by which a man may die, <S%H4191><s%> and he died, <S%H4191><s%> he is a murderer: <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

The avenger of blood <S%H1818><s%> shall himself put the murderer <S%H7523><s%> to death: <S%H4191><s%> when he <S%H1931><s%> meets <S%H6293><s%> him, <S%H1931><s%> he shall put him to death. <S%H4191><s%>
If he thrust <S%H1920><s%> him of hatred, <S%H8135><s%> or hurled <S%H7993><s%> at him, <S%H6660><s%> lying in wait, so that he died, <S%H4191><s%>

or in enmity <S%H342><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> him with his hand, <S%H3027><s%> so that he died; <S%H4191><s%> he who struck <S%H5221><s%> him shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> he is a murderer: <S%H7523><s%> the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> shall put the murderer <S%H7523><s%> to death, <S%H4191><s%> when he meets him. <S%H6293><s%>
<S%H1920><s%>"'But if he thrust him suddenly <S%H6621><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> enmity, <S%H342><s%> or hurled <S%H7993><s%> on him anything <S%H3627><s%> without lying in wait, <S%H6660><s%>

or with any stone, <S%H68><s%> by which a man may die, <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> seeing <S%H7200><s%> him, <S%H5307><s%> and cast it on him, <S%H4191><s%> so that he died, and he was not his enemy, <S%H341><s%> neither sought <S%H1245><s%> his harm; <S%H7451><s%>
then the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall judge <S%H8199><s%> between the striker <S%H5221><s%> and the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> according to these ordinances; <S%H4941><s%>

and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall restore <S%H7725><s%> him to his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> where he was fled: <S%H5127><s%> and he shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein until the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> who was anointed <S%H4886><s%> with the holy <S%H6944><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>
<S%H7523><s%>"'But if the manslayer shall at any time <S%H3318><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> beyond the border <S%H1366><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> where he flees, <S%H5127><s%>

and the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> him outside <S%H2351><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> and the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> kill <S%H7523><s%> the manslayer; <S%H7523><s%> he shall not be guilty of blood, <S%H1818><s%>

because he should have remained <S%H3427><s%> in his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> until the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest: <S%H3548><s%> but after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of his possession. <S%H272><s%>
<S%H2708><s%>"'These things shall be for a statute and ordinance <S%H4941><s%> to you throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

<S%H5221><s%>"'Whoever kills any person, <S%H5315><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall be slain <S%H7523><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of witnesses: <S%H5707><s%> but one <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not testify <S%H6030><s%> against any person <S%H5315><s%> that he die. <S%H4191><s%>

<S%H3947><s%>"'Moreover you shall take no ransom <S%H3724><s%> for the life <S%H5315><s%> of a murderer <S%H7523><s%> who is guilty <S%H7563><s%> of death; <S%H4191><s%> but he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

<S%H3947><s%>"'You shall take no ransom <S%H3724><s%> for him who is fled <S%H5127><s%> to his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> that he may come again <S%H7725><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> until the death <S%H4194><s%> of the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

<S%H2610><s%>"'So you shall not pollute the land <S%H776><s%> in which you are: <S%H1818><s%> for blood, it pollutes <S%H2610><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> and no expiation <S%H3722><s%> can be made for the land <S%H776><s%> for the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is shed <S%H8210><s%> therein, <S%H1818><s%> but by the blood of him who shed it. <S%H8210><s%>

You shall not defile <S%H2930><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which you inhabit, <S%H3427><s%> in the midst of which <S%H8432><s%> I dwell: <S%H7931><s%> for I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, dwell <S%H7931><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> the midst of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>'"
